list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an enclosed stall in a church divided by a screen or curtain in which a priest sits to hear people confess their sins.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: những bí mật của sự thú nhận

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an admission or acknowledgment that one has done something that one is ashamed or embarrassed about; a confession.
(especially of speech or writing) in which a person reveals or admits to private thoughts or past incidents, especially ones that cause shame or embarrassment.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tự truyện là thú vị đáng chú ý

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: relating to confessions of faith or doctrinal systems.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the confessional approach to religious education
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cách tiếp cận thú vị đối với giáo dục tôn giáo
